title: Can't restore devices settings, SMS, etc after fresh reset with new PIN
content:
I had to reset my phone and create a new screen lock pin and could not restore old backup during the initial setup as it was requiring the OLD pin.  So i was instructed to skip restore and do later.

The restore is not happening properly.

I have the restore backup in my google drive and I'm using Google One. I can preview the restore and see device settings, sms, and everything that i want restored but it's not happening.

There was no notification to finish setup or a box in settings telling me to finish setup

 I have learned that I need to reinstall G One and then click restore to bring back the Photos and Media, which it is doing right now but I am still not getting the device settings and call history, SMS restored.  I have learned that is Android's Job.

pictures of old and new backups with preview of data i want to restore but can't

How do I direct android to restore the call history, device settings, apps, etc?  I can see it in Google drive but don't know how to activate it and it is not happening automatically as it has been 3 days since Fresh reset and new Pin was created.

This has been going on for 3 days and i now see that there is a new backup added in google drive of the reset phone (which is not useful as it is a backup of the fresh reset).  This backup does not have the Google One icon behind it as i had not installed One when this backup was created.

thanks for any help
